"A.P.238/4/8": "Oh my, who's there? Oh, it's you. Lisa won't shoot you then."
"Lisa would get in trouble before the festivities even started."
"Speaking of which, the Battle Championship festival thing is about to start, isn't it?"
"There's one rule that's kind of disappointing. Apparently you've gotta team up with someone for it."
"Lisa wanted to go by herself and give it her all, though... That's too bad!"
"Still, trying to do what you can within the rules is also exciting, so that can be a good thing in itself, you know?"
"Have you paired up with anyone? Lisa is free, so you could invite her if you want."

"If Lisa doesn't scare you, that is.
Hehe. Hehehe."
"Well then, farewell, and well, goodbye! Let's meet up again soon, 'kay?"
